Locks funds for specified order.

Parameters

  • order (Order) â€“ The order funds will be locked for.

Returns

Quantity â€“ The locked quantity for order.

Raises

  • DoubleLockedQuantity â€“ Raised if the given amount is already a locked quantity.

  • InsufficientFunds â€“ Raised if amount is greater the current balance.

static transfer(source: tensortrade.oms.wallets.wallet.Wallet, target: tensortrade.oms.wallets.wallet.Wallet, quantity: tensortrade.oms.instruments.quantity.Quantity, commission: tensortrade.oms.instruments.quantity.Quantity, exchange_pair: tensortrade.oms.instruments.exchange_pair.ExchangePair, reason: str) → tensortrade.oms.wallets.wallet.Transfer[source]Â¶

Transfers funds from one wallet to another.

Parameters

  • source (Wallet) â€“ The wallet in which funds will be transferred from

  • target (Wallet) â€“ The wallet in which funds will be transferred to

  • quantity (Quantity) â€“ The quantity to be transferred from the source to the target. In terms of the instrument of the source wallet.

  • commission (Quantity) â€“ The commission to be taken from the source wallet for performing the transfer of funds.

  • exchange_pair (ExchangePair) â€“ The exchange pair associated with the transfer

  • reason (str) â€“ The reason for transferring the funds.

Returns

Transfer â€“ A transfer object describing the transaction.

Raises

Exception â€“ Raised if an equation that describes the conservation of funds is broken.

unlock(quantity: tensortrade.oms.instruments.quantity.Quantity, reason: str) → tensortrade.oms.instruments.quantity.Quantity[source]Â¶

Unlocks a certain amount from the locked funds of the wallet that are associated with the given quantity path id.

Parameters

  • quantity (Quantity) â€“ The quantity to unlock from the funds.

  • reason (str) â€“ The reason for unlocking funds.

Returns

Quantity â€“ The free quantity.

Raises

  • DoubleUnlockedFunds â€“ Raised if quantity is not a locked quantity.

  • QuantityNotLocked â€“ Raised if quantity has a path id that is not currently allocated in this wallet.

  • InsufficientFunds â€“ Raised if quantity is greater than the amount currently allocated for the associated path id.
